properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 5 at 10:54PM EST until February 8 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a
Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky...

The Cumberland River at Baxter
The Cumberland River at Pineville

The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Cumberland River at Pineville.
* from late tonight to Saturday morning.
* At 10 PM Wednesday the stage was 991.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 1002 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to a crest nearing 1002 feet on
Thursday evening or Thursday night and then begin to recede.
The river will run high into the day on Saturday.
* At 1002 feet...Low lying roads flood, including portions of
Straight Creek, Dorton Branch, and Fourmile Road.
properties.instruction:
Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by 1100 AM on Thursday.
